name: Sensation Seeking Scale
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: Zuckerman M. (1984). Sensation seeking: a comparative approach to a human trait. Behavioral and Brain Sciences. 7: 413-471.

variableMeasured.name: sss1
variableMeasured.description: 1:I would like a job that requires a lot of traveling. vs 0:I would prefer a job in one location.

variableMeasured.name: sss2
variableMeasured.description: 1:I am invigorated by a brisk, cold day. vs 0:I cannot wait to get indoors on a cold day.

variableMeasured.name: sss3
variableMeasured.description: 1:I get bored seeing the same old faces. vs 0:I like the comfortable familiarity of everyday friends.

variableMeasured.name: sss4
variableMeasured.description: 0:I would prefer living in an ideal society in which everyone is safe, secure, and happy. vs 1:I would have preferred living in the unsettled days of our history.

variableMeasured.name: sss5
variableMeasured.description: 1:I sometimes like to do things that are a little frightening. vs 0:A sensible person avoids activities that are dangerous.

variableMeasured.name: sss6
variableMeasured.description: 0:I would not like to be hypnotized. vs 1:I would like to have the experience of being hypnotized.

variableMeasured.name: sss7
variableMeasured.description: 1:The most important goal of life is to live it to the fullest and experience as much as possible. vs 0:The most important goal of life is to find peace and happiness.

variableMeasured.name: sss8
variableMeasured.description: 1:I would like to try parachute jumping. vs 0:I would never want to try jumping out of a plane, with or without a parachute.

variableMeasured.name: sss9
variableMeasured.description: 0:I enter cold water gradually, giving myself time to get used to it. vs 1:I like to dive or jump right in to the ocean or a cold pool.

variableMeasured.name: sss10
variableMeasured.description: 0:When I go on vacation, I prefer the comfort of a good room and bed. vs 1:When I go on vacation, I prefer the change of camping out.

variableMeasured.name: sss11
variableMeasured.description: 1:I prefer people who are emotionally expressive even if they are a bit unstable. vs 0:I prefer people who are calm and even-tempered.

variableMeasured.name: sss12
variableMeasured.description: 1:A good painting should shock or jolt the senses. vs 0:A good painting should give one a feeling of peace and security.

variableMeasured.name: sss13
variableMeasured.description: 0:People who ride motorcycles must have some kind of unconscious need to hurt themselves. vs 1:I would like to drive or ride a motorcycle.

variableMeasured.name: sss14
variableMeasured.description: 0:In a good sexual relationship, people never get bored with each other. vs 1:It is normal to get bored after a time with the same sexual partner.
